Title: Authorizes towing a person on water skis with a vessel without an observer under certain circumstances
Summary: Authorizes towing a person on water skis with a vessel without an observer under certain circumstances.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the navigation law, in relation to observers for persons being towed on water skis by a vessel
